list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: any of the pieces of hard whitish tissue making up the skeleton in humans and other vertebrates.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his injuries included many broken bones
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chấn thương của anh ấy bao gồm nhiều xương gãy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the calcified material of which bones consist.
the basic or essential framework of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: you need to put some flesh on the bones of your idea
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bạn cần phải đặt một ít thịt vào xương của ý tưởng của bạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: remove the bones from (meat or fish).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: while the gumbo is simmering, bone the cooked chicken
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong khi Gumbo đang sôi, xương gà nấu chín

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: study (a subject) intensively, typically in preparation for something.
